head.title: Quality Care and Services for OCI Properties
head.description: We provide a wide range of services to help you manage your home, car, while away or if you are already at home. Our professionals are here to ensure everything runs smoothly, so everything is ready, safe and sound so you can enjoy your stay at maximum peace of mind.

home_care.title: Home Care
home_care.description: Home checking, cleaning interiors and exteriors, providing a tidy living space. Garden and other commodities in our professional hands.

return_preparation_services.title: Return Preparation Services
return_preparation_services.description: You come back home and want everything to be ready when you are here? You need a quick pick-me-up? You need arrangements for booking? We are here for you.

property_security.title: Property Security
property_security.description: Ensuring the safety and security of your property with regular inspections and monitoring.

emergency_services.title: Emergency Services
emergency_services.description: Something unexpected happened while abroad? We are here to help you with emergency services, whether it's a broken pipe, a power outage, or any other urgent situation. Our team is ready to respond quickly and efficiently.

essential.title: Essential Plan
essential.description: Ideal for small properties or short stays.

comfort.title: Comfort Plan
comfort.description: Perfect for medium-sized properties or longer stays.

features.5: Emergency Response delay: as soon as possible

executive.title: Executive Plan
executive.description: Best for large properties or frequent travelers.

signature.title: Signature Plan
signature.description: Best for large properties or frequent travelers.

features.12: Luxury Asset Oversight: Art, wine, staff mgmt.

bespoke.title: Bespoke Plan
bespoke.description: Premium support of exceptional people and properties.

features.1: Custom or live-in steward Property Inspections
features.2: Daily or resident staff Interior Cleaning & Airing
features.4: Full staff with botanist input for Garden & Lawn Care
features.7: Emergency Response delay: 24x7 on-call estate manager
features.8: Lifestyle-based, chef readiness for Return Preparation
features.9: Secure portal + reports for Photo/Video Reports
features.11: Smart Home/Alarm Sync: Full system monitoring
features.12: Vet visits + live-in caretaker for Pet Care
features.13: Luxury Asset Oversight: Asset reporting, safekeeping
features.14: Staff Coordination: Full HR & payroll for estate staff
features.16: Hight Confidentiality Requirements (Custom NDA + legal review)

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: Suppavisor is a team of passionate professionals dedicated to delivering high-quality services that drive results. With years of experience across multiple industries, we are committed to make you happy. We are based in Punjab, India, and willing to expend our expertise to all over India in near future.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.description: We would love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to us. Our team is here to assist you and ensure you have the best experience possible.
